data.eml:eml: Taxonomic changes and an updated catalogue for the Palaearctic Sericini (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Melolonthinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ahrens, Dirk (2007): Taxonomic changes and an updated catalogue for the Palaearctic Sericini (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Melolonthinae). Zootaxa 1504: 1-51, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.177151
